chatMessages.welcome:
Hello! Welcome.
Feel free to ask anything about plastic surgery.

cautionSection.title: Important Notes
items: Limousine service is only available for hospital/procedure reservations when visiting Korea.
The limousine option can be selected during the reservation application stage after applying for a consultation.
Concierge service, such as hot places and restaurant tours in Korea, is provided for advance reservations.

items.title: Daily limousine usage fees are as follows.
details: - Supercar Lamborghini Urus: 1,080 USD per day
- Includes driver's fee, driver's meal, toll gate fees, and taxes
- Based on 8 hours of use from 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM
- Additional charges for extra hours: Supercar 150 USD/hour (on-site card payment)
- Fuel costs settled later (on-site card payment)
- Additional charges for driving outside Seoul (on-site card payment)

items: Payment is only possible based on 8 hours per day.
If short-term travel is needed, it is convenient to use international taxis or local taxi apps after arriving in Korea.

footer.address: 701-014, 103 Misagangbyeonnam-ro, Hanam-si, Gyeonggi-do, Republic of Korea

description.part1: K-DOC is a service planned by a team of medical professionals from
description.part2: , led by Dr. Woo Jung-ho, a global authority in the medical field. Our headquarters, located in a landmark building in Apgujeong, leads global beauty trends, and Dr. Woo, widely known as the 'Master of Thread Lifting' even in Japan, has been featured in prominent international media such as FOX TV News.

ceoGreeting.title: CEO Message
ceoGreeting.name: President Woo Jung Ho M.D.
ceoGreeting.greeting: สวัสดีครับ
content: K-DOC is Korea's premier medical beauty platform, created to guide Thai clients in selecting only the top 5% of plastic surgery and dermatology clinics in Korea—clinics you can truly trust—while also offering exclusive discount benefits.

Our management team includes myself, Dr. Woo Jung Ho, M.D., a world-renowned authority in thread lifting and non-invasive aesthetic procedures, along with Dr. Park Jong Hyeon, M.D., and other distinguished medical professionals educated at some of the world's leading universities. Together, we take great pride in planning and operating this platform. Above all, K-DOC is designed to guide international patients, including those from Thailand, toward safe, verified, and trustworthy medical services in Korea—ensuring that you experience the very best of Korean medical expertise.

Through this platform, you will have access to reliable information on Korea's most reputable aesthetic clinics, authentic treatment reviews, and comprehensive services—from hospital booking and professional interpretation to post-treatment care—all in one place.

K-DOC is not merely an information platform. We aspire to be your trusted and convenient partner in your Korean medical beauty journey, providing each and every client with tailored solutions and a safe, satisfying experience.

We sincerely hope you can experience Korea's advanced aesthetic medical technologies safely, without risk, and with complete peace of mind. K-DOC will be with you every step of the way toward greater beauty, confidence, and health.
Dr. Woo Jung Ho Chief Executive Officer

seoulOffice.title: K-DOC Seoul Office
seoulOffice.description: K-DOC Tower, a landmark located on Apgujeong Rodeo Street, Seoul's most famous street in Gangnam

sections.title: 2025 Thailand Expansion
sections.description:
K-DOC, a global plastic surgery medical platform for Thai customers!
K-DOC carefully selects only the top 5% of Korea's leading plastic surgery and dermatology clinics to help Thai customers choose with confidence.

sections.title: Essential Plastic Surgery Platform for Customers
sections.description: View desired procedures and plastic surgery information in Korea at a glance, compare real reviews and hospital information to make confident decisions. Experience everything from booking to interpretation and post-procedure care conveniently through K-DOC.

sections.title: Introduction to Korea's Famous Hospitals
sections.description: K-DOC only partners with world-renowned medical professionals and verified leading Korean plastic surgery clinics. Thai and global customers can experience high-quality plastic surgery services through trusted medical professionals and safe systems.
